<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
The user wants a much bigger mail icon and wants to use a Wingdings mail icon. Wingdings doesn't render well on web because it requires the Wingdings font. Instead, I should use a Unicode character that looks like the Wingdings mail icon. The common envelope icons in Unicode are:
- ‚úâ (U+2709) - envelope
- üìß (U+1F4E7) - e-mail symbol
- üì® (U+1F4E8) - incoming envelope
- üì© (U+1F4E9) - envelope with arrow

Or I could use an SVG icon for better control. Let me try making the current envelope icon much bigger first, and if the user wants a specific Wingdings style, I can use an SVG.
